questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Have the ability to teleport to each other instantly
questions.optionB: Have unlimited free flights to visit each other anytime

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Share all your dreams with each other every morning
questions.optionB: Share all your meals together virtually every day

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Know exactly what your partner is feeling at all times
questions.optionB: Know exactly what your partner is thinking once a day

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Relive your first date together once a year
questions.optionB: Get a glimpse of one day in your future together

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Have a love song written about your relationship
questions.optionB: Have a painting made that captures your love story

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Be able to cook any meal your partner is craving perfectly
questions.optionB: Be able to give the perfect massage whenever they need it

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Spend a romantic week in Paris together
questions.optionB: Spend a relaxing week on a private tropical island together

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Always know the perfect gift to give your partner
questions.optionB: Always know the perfect words to say when they're upset

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Have a scrapbook that magically fills with your favorite memories
questions.optionB: Have a playlist that always plays songs matching your mood together

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Be able to send a hug that your partner can physically feel
questions.optionB: Be able to send a kiss that your partner can physically feel

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Have matching tattoos that glow when you think of each other
questions.optionB: Have matching jewelry that warms up when your partner misses you

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Never have to say goodbye at the airport again
questions.optionB: Always have the most amazing reunion every time you meet

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Be able to watch movies together as if in the same room
questions.optionB: Be able to play any video game together as if side by side

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Have your partner write you a love letter every week
questions.optionB: Have a 30-minute video call every day guaranteed

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Fall asleep and wake up at the same time as your partner
questions.optionB: Share the same dreams while sleeping

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Have a photo booth that captures moments from parallel universes where you're together
questions.optionB: Have a crystal ball showing your happiest future moments

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Speak a secret language only you two understand
questions.optionB: Communicate telepathically but only about feelings

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Have one perfect day together every month
questions.optionB: Have an extra hour added to every video call

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Receive a care package from your partner every week
questions.optionB: Send your scent to your partner so they can smell you anytime

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Have unlimited data and best connection quality for video calls forever
questions.optionB: Have a hologram device that projects your partner life-sized

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Cook the same meal together virtually every Sunday
questions.optionB: Have a virtual movie night with synchronized playback every Friday

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Know your partner's exact location anytime
questions.optionB: Know your partner's mood throughout the day

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Receive a 'thinking of you' notification whenever your partner thinks of you
questions.optionB: See a heart appear in the sky whenever you both look up at the same time

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Have your favorite photo of you two as a couple projected as a constellation
questions.optionB: Have a star officially named after your relationship

questions.question: Would you rather...
questions.optionA: Be able to send voice messages that play as your partner's internal voice
questions.optionB: Be able to send text messages that appear in your partner's handwriting
